meanings.definition: Blooming or producing flowers more than once in a season.
meanings.sent1: The remontant roses in our garden bloom multiple times each year.
meanings.sent2: The remontant nature of these flowers brings color to our garden throughout the seasons.
meanings.sent3: It's like these remontant flowers can't decide when to stop blooming!
meanings.sent4: The remontant blooms are like a never-ending cycle of floral beauty.
meanings.sent5: The remontant flowers paint our garden with continuous bursts of color.

meanings.definition: A plant that blooms more than once in a season.
meanings.sent1: The remontant in our backyard surprises us with new blooms frequently.
meanings.sent2: We enjoy the variety of colors that the remontant plants bring to our garden.
meanings.sent3: Imagine having a garden full of remontant plants - it would be a floral paradise!
meanings.sent4: The remontant in our neighbor's garden is like a botanical magician, blooming repeatedly.
meanings.sent5: The remontant plant's ability to bloom multiple times is truly remarkable.
